item.title: Software Product Explainer Video Expert - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled software product explainer expert who can create a compelling video + screen record of our product. The video should be approximately 90 seconds long and serve as an explainer video to showcase the features and benefits of our software product. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging explainer videos and a deep understanding of how to effectively communicate complex concepts through visuals and narration.

Key skills required for this project include:
- Proficiency in video editing software
- Strong storytelling and scriptwriting skills
- Ability to capture and record screen footage
- Creative use of visual effects and animations

If you have a knack for simplifying complex ideas and can deliver high-quality explainer videos within the given time frame, we'd love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work along with your application.

Hourly Range: $18.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:06 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Skills: Explainer Video, Video Production, Video Editing, Motion Graphics
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Shortform and Long form Youtuibe Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and creative freelance video editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in all aspects of video editing, including capturing footage, editing, color grading, sound design, and motion graphics.

Responsibilities:

Edit and assemble video footage in a creative and engaging way
Work with producers and directors to ensure the final product meets the project objectives and client expectations
Incorporate music, sound effects, and other audio elements into the final product
Create visual effects and motion graphics to enhance the final product
Ensure all projects are delivered on time and within budget
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technology advancements
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a Video Editor
Experience with Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and Photoshop
Strong attention to detail and the ability to work independently
Excellent communication and time management skills
Strong understanding of color grading and audio mixing

item.title: AI Content Creator for Printed Sportswear Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced AI content creator to join our team and develop engaging and innovative content for our custom printed sportswear brand's social media platforms. As an expert in AI content creation, you will be responsible for generating high-quality content that resonates with our target audience and reflects our brand's unique personality. Your responsibilities will include crafting captivating captions, writing informative and entertaining blog posts, and creating visually appealing graphics.

We would like someone to have a robust content strategy, and generate content for twitter, instagram, facebook and tiktok all using AI. The content needs to be social posts, videos and graphics. The daily theme can be the same and the content can be repurposed across all social channels. The content needs to be engaging and drive people to interact with the posts.

To qualify please send specific examples content across all the above format.

Key skills required:
- Proficiency in AI content creation
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and trends
- Excellent writing and communication skills
- Creative thinking and ability to generate engaging ideas
- Graphic design and video editing skills are a plus

This is a medium-sized project that requires a commitment of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an expert AI content creator with a proven track record of delivering exceptional results in the sportswear industry.


Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:03 UTC
Category: Logo Design
Skills:Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Print Design, Logo Design
Skills: Adobe Illustrator, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Print Design, Logo Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Professional Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
$10 per 10-15 minute video edited

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced video editor with over 5 years of experience in editing YouTube and Instagram videos. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of creating engaging, high-quality videos quickly and efficiently. This role requires a keen eye for detail, creativity, and the ability to work under tight deadlines.

Responsibilities:

Edit 10-15 minute videos for YouTube and Instagram, ensuring high-quality production and timely delivery.
Enhance video content with appropriate effects, transitions, and graphics.
Ensure videos are optimized for each platform, adhering to best practices for video length, format, and engagement.
Collaborate with our content team to understand the vision and objectives of each video project.
Implement feedback quickly and make necessary adjustments to improve video quality.
Qualifications:

Minimum of 5 years of experience in video editing for YouTube and Instagram.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Strong understanding of video production techniques, including color correction, sound editing, and motion graphics.
Demonstrated ability to edit videos quickly without compromising quality.
Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail and visual aesthetics.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with excellent communication skills.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience in creating viral content and understanding of social media trends.
Portfolio showcasing a range of edited videos, particularly for YouTube and Instagram.
How to Apply:
Please submit your application, including your resume, portfolio, and a brief summary of your video editing experience, to  Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis, so early submissions are encouraged.


Budget: $10
Posted On: June 29, 2024 21:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Music Video, Video Intro & Outro, Concept Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video
Skills: Music Video, Video Intro & Outro, Concept Video, AI-Generated Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video

item.title: Images/Videos/Graphics for Websites - Upwork
item.description:
Part time to full time opportunity. (Or looking for someone to consult on a regular basis.)

We are building out a few websites for a new business and would like access to better quality images and videos that we can use. We are having trouble finding images and videos that most accurately represent where we are trying to insert them. We are looking for someone that is good at finding pictures and videos online that we can use for 1) websites 2) website designs 3) Landing pages 4) ads, etc...

We are really looking for an expert that we can consult regularly to either find or produce images and videos that match our description.

For example: We are looking for a background video for a website. We'd like to have a few video options that best shows a team working on designing and developing a website. Something that looks professional and would align with what we do.

We encourage anyone with any experience to apply and would be very interested in using your skills for future projects.  

***Someone that is good with AI generated images and videos is a plus!!***


Posted On: June 29, 2024 20:59 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Web Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Graphic Design, Website Asset
Skills: Web Design, Adobe Photoshop, Photo Editing, Graphic Design, Website Asset
Country: United States
click to apply

I'm currently looking for a talented video editor to join our team on a recurring project basis. We can provide up to 7 YouTube videos per month, primarily focused on vlogs and challenges. These videos are typically less than 30 minutes of raw footage and are not very complicated.

item.title: Skilled Video Editor for Instagram & TikTok Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a knack for creating engaging content? I'm looking for someone exceptional to join my team and help manage my Instagram and TikTok posts.

Responsibilities:

Edit and compile daily video content (reels) for Instagram and TikTok
Apply cutting, compiling, colouring, transition effects, sound effects, adding subtitles through an easy app I use, etc.
Post daily content from my account, including:
Photos
Edited reels
Reposting premade reels with credits from a saved folder
Manage hashtags and captions for each post

Requirements:
Proficiency in video editing software
Strong skills in video editing, including cutting, compiling, coloring, transition effects, and sound effects
Ability to manage and schedule daily posts efficiently
Good communication skills to follow guidance and implement feedback
Experience in social media management is a plus

What I Offer:
$25 weekly ($100/month)
Guidance and support in content direction
Opportunity to start immediately and begin posting from July 1st
An estimated 15-20 minutes of work daily

To Apply:
Please send me a couple of examples of your work and a brief description of your experience. Looking forward to seeing your creativity and skill!

Budget: $25

Category: Video Editing

item.title: SLICK Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Position: YouTube Video Editor
Budget: $10-$50 per video
Location: Remote
Type: Freelance/Part-time
About Us:
VEGANFAST  is a dynamic and growing YouTube channel dedicated to Health and wellness. Our mission is to provide high-quality, engaging, and informative content to our audience. We are looking for a talented and creative video editor to join our team and help us take our videos to the next level.
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and passionate YouTube Video Editor to help produce captivating videos for our channel. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for creativity, detail-oriented, a good sense of pacing, and the ability to tell a compelling story through video. This is a remote, freelance position with a budget of $10-$50 per video, depending on the complexity and length of the project.
Responsibilities:
Edit raw footage into polished, engaging videos that align with our brand and vision.
Add music, sound effects, graphics, and special effects to enhance video quality.
Ensure the final video meets the required length and specifications.
Collaborate with the content creator to understand the vision and requirements for each video.
Make revisions based on feedback to ensure the final product is of the highest quality.
Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and techniques to keep our content fresh and innovative.
Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines consistently.
NB
If I supplied you with a voiceover and script can you make a video?
Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a portfolio of YouTube videos.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar.
Strong understanding of YouTube platform and trends.
Ability to work independently and remotely.
Excellent communication skills and ability to take constructive feedback.
Attention to detail and a strong sense of storytelling and pacing.
Reliable internet connection for downloading/uploading large files.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with motion graphics and animation.
Basic knowledge of color grading and audio mixing.
Familiarity with SEO and YouTube analytics.
How to Apply:
If you are passionate about video editing and want to contribute to a growing YouTube channel, we’d love to hear from you!  Reply with the CONFIRMED  so that we can be you READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION. Please send your resume, a brief introduction, and links to your portfolio or previous work. item.ns0:encoded:
Position: YouTube Video Editor
Budget: $10-$50 per video
Location: Remote
Type: Freelance/Part-time
About Us:
VEGANFAST  is a dynamic and growing YouTube channel dedicated to Health and wellness. Our mission is to provide high-quality, engaging, and informative content to our audience. We are looking for a talented and creative video editor to join our team and help us take our videos to the next level.
Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled and passionate YouTube Video Editor to help produce captivating videos for our channel. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for creativity, detail-oriented, a good sense of pacing, and the ability to tell a compelling story through video. This is a remote, freelance position with a budget of $10-$50 per video, depending on the complexity and length of the project.
Responsibilities:
Edit raw footage into polished, engaging videos that align with our brand and vision.
Add music, sound effects, graphics, and special effects to enhance video quality.
Ensure the final video meets the required length and specifications.
Collaborate with the content creator to understand the vision and requirements for each video.
Make revisions based on feedback to ensure the final product is of the highest quality.
Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and techniques to keep our content fresh and innovative.
Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines consistently.
NB
If I supplied you with a voiceover and script can you make a video?
Requirements:
Proven experience as a video editor, preferably with a portfolio of YouTube videos.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or similar.
Strong understanding of YouTube platform and trends.
Ability to work independently and remotely.
Excellent communication skills and ability to take constructive feedback.
Attention to detail and a strong sense of storytelling and pacing.
Reliable internet connection for downloading/uploading large files.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with motion graphics and animation.
Basic knowledge of color grading and audio mixing.
Familiarity with SEO and YouTube analytics.
How to Apply:
If you are passionate about video editing and want to contribute to a growing YouTube channel, we’d love to hear from you!  Reply with the CONFIRMED  so that we can be you READ THE JOB DESCRIPTION. Please send your resume, a brief introduction, and links to your portfolio or previous work. We look forward to seeing your creative work and potentially working together to create amazing content!



Budget: $25
